response.overview: RELIVE DANNY BOYLE'S 2012 OPENING CEREMONIES  A NIGHT TO REMEMBER - LONDON 2012 is a documentary featuring extended extracts from the 2012 London Olympics opening ceremony.  On 27 July 2022, for the 10th anniversary of the London Olympics, a newly cut version of Danny Boyle’s Opening Ceremonies for both Olympics and Paralympics will be shown as a one-off to raise money and awareness for treatment and research into brain cancer through the Tessa Jowell Foundation. The Tessa Jowell Foundation is aiming to raise £4 million to make sure that every NHS brain cancer patient can access excellent care and to develop a new children’s brain cancer centre of excellence programme. Proceeds of this screening will be donated to the foundation.
response.title: A Night to Remember - London 2012
